snippet.title: Bedlam - Vectrex [Longplay]
snippet.description:
What do you think of Bedlam?
This is a longplay of the Vectrex version which was released in 1983.
The video will show a full walkthrough and display the gameplay.

Did you play this game or have any opinion on what you can see?
Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

Completion Criteria: Credits

Developed by: Lenny Carlson, William Hawkins
Published by: GCE
Played by: Gremolin

----
